section.title: WS-Security
section.para: The framework implements the Web Services Security: SOAP Message Security, Web Services Security: Username Token Profile and Web Services Security: X.509 Token Profile specifications.

section.title: Transport (HTTPS) Security
section.para: The transport security solution used by the framework consists of HTTP over SSL/TLS (HTTPS) using X.509 certificates. The path validation step has been augmented to support the Proxy Certificate Profile (RFC3820).
